mapper.insert: INSERT INTO connections ( ID, GEOM ) VALUES ( #{id}, st_geomfromtext(#{geom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 3857) )

INSERT INTO cross_sections_interpolation_surfaces ( THREED_GEOM, USXSID, DSXSID, TRIANGLE_GEOM ) VALUES ( st_geomfromtext(#{threed_geom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 3857), #{usxsId}, #{dsxsId}, st_geomfromtext(#{triangle_geom}) )

INSERT INTO cross_sections ( LEFT_BANK, RIGHT_BANK, CONTRACTION_COEF, EXPANSION_COEF, STARTING_ELEVATION, VERTICAL_INCREMENT, VERTICAL_SLICES, LOB_SLICES, CHANNEL_SLICES, ROB_SLICES, LENGTH_LOB, LENGTH_CHAN, LENGTH_ROB, LEFT_LEVEE_STA, LEFT_LEVEE_ELEV, RIGHT_LEVEE_STA, RIGHT_LEVEE_ELEV, MANNING_GEOM, POLYLINE_GEOM, REACH_NAME, RIVER_NAME, RIVER_STATION, STATION_ELEVATION_GEOM, INEFFECTIVE_GEOM ) VALUES ( #{leftBank}, #{rightBank}, #{contractionCoef}, #{expansionCoef}, #{startingElevation}, #{verticalIncrement}, #{verticalSlices}, #{lobSlices}, #{channelSlices}, #{robSlices}, #{lengthLob}, #{lengthRob}, #{lengthChan}, #{leftLeveeSta}, #{leftLeveeElev}, #{rightLeveeSta}, #{rightLeveeElev}, st_geomfromtext(#{mannings}, 3857), st_geomfromtext(#{polyLine}, 3857), #{reachNames}, #{riverNames}, #{riverStations}, st_geomfromtext(#{stationElevation}, 3857), st_geomfromtext(#{ineffectiveGeom}, 3857) )
INSERT INTO junctions ( NAME, GEOM ) VALUES ( #{name}, st_geomfromtext(#{geom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 3857) )

INSERT INTO river_centerlines ( DS_JUNCTION, GEOM, REACH_NAME, RIVER_NAME, US_JUNCTION, DS_SA_2D, US_SA_2D ) VALUES
( #{item.dsJunction}, st_geomfromtext(#{item.geom}, 3857), #{item.reachName}, #{item.riverName}, #{item.usJunction}, #{item.dsSa2d}, #{item.usSa2d} )

INSERT INTO storage_areas ( ID, POLYGON_GEOM, POLYGON_AREA, VOLUME_ELEVATION_GEOM ) VALUES
